trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> object in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um editor de componente para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> objeto associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> object in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control at design time, under the control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: A classe SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor fornece uma interface do usuário para edição de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>elementos do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>objeto associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle em tempo de design, sob o controle do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>

trans-unit.source: There is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: Há um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>associados a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> object is used to apply styles to static submenu items that depend on their level (nesting depth) in the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>objeto é usado para aplicar estilos a itens de submenu estático que dependem de seu nível (profundidade de aninhamento) na estrutura do menu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: The SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor is invoked, for example, by selecting the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **LevelSubMenuStyles** row in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: O SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor é invocado, por exemplo, selecionando o botão de reticências (**... **) no **LevelSubMenuStyles** linha o **propriedades** grade do visual designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false` to indicate that only one object can be selected at a time in the editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>método sempre retorna `false` para indicar que apenas um objeto pode ser selecionado por vez no editor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> method creates a new form to display and edit the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>método cria um novo formulário para exibir e editar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> method creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A>método cria uma nova instância do tipo de item de coleção especificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A> method returns an array of types that the editor can create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>método retorna uma matriz de tipos que o editor pode criar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> class when you select, for example, the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **LevelSubMenuStyles** row in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer when designing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control or a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância da classe <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>quando você seleciona, por exemplo, no botão de reticências (**... **) no **LevelSubMenuStyles** linha o **propriedades** grade do visual designer durante a criação de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle ou um controle que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the collection to edit.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>da coleção para edição.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether multiple <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> elements can be selected in the editor at one time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se várias <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> elementos podem ser selecionados no editor de uma só vez.

trans-unit.source: The CanSelectMultipleInstances method always returns `false`; thus, only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object can be selected at a time in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> object.
trans-unit.target: O método CanSelectMultipleInstances sempre retorna `false`; assim, apenas um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>objeto pode ser selecionado por vez no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new form to display and edit the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo formulário para exibir e editar atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The CreateCollectionForm method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> base method to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> form, and then formats a caption for the form.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método CreateCollectionForm o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>base do método para criar a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>de formulário e, em seguida, formata uma legenda para o formulário.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm> to use as the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância das <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm>para usar como o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do tipo de item de coleção especificada.

trans-unit.source: The CreateInstance method is used to create new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateInstance é usado para criar novos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>

trans-unit.source: The CreateInstance calls the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method to access the activation methods for late-bound support.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de CreateInstance o <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>método para acessar os métodos de ativação para suporte de associação tardia.</xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the item to create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do item para criar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified type, which should be <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do tipo especificado, que deve ser <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data types that this collection editor can create.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os tipos de dados que pode criar este editor de coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> object can create <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> type objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>pode criar objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>objetos do tipo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: A type array of the data types the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"></xref> can create.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipo dos tipos de dados de <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"> </xref> pode criar.
